titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Arthur Noble deed, July 18, 1789, for property in the seigniory of Sault Ste. Marie belonging to Pierre Amable De Bonne and sold to James and Elizabeth Caldwell of Watervliet, New York, then sold to Arthur Noble of Nobelborough, New York

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Arthur Noble deed, July 18, 1789, for property in the seigniory of Sault Ste. Marie belonging to Pierre Amable De Bonne and sold to James and Elizabeth Caldwell of Watervliet, New York, then sold to Arthur Noble of Nobelborough, New York
